[[Portable application|Portable software]] is a class of [[Computer program|software]] that is suitable for use on portable drives such as a [[USB flash drive|USB (thumb) drive]] or [[digital audio player]] or [[PDA]] with "drive mode", although any [[external hard drive]] can be used.
